title: ImageDrawLine
name: ImageDrawLine
description: Draws a single line defined by two sets of x and y coordinates on a image.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x1
arguments.description: The x coordinate for the start point of the line.

arguments.name: y1
arguments.description: The y coordinate for the start point of the line.

arguments.name: x2
arguments.description: The x coordinate for the end point of the line.

arguments.name: y2
arguments.description: The y coordinate for the end point of the line.
